name: Maja - cardigan
languages: ...and 9 other languages show hide other languages
full_text: Free pattern from Järbo. January 2022: Some of you seemed to have problems increasing in the sleeves within the motif so I draw a chart for each size: you will find it here . Hope that helps! Kindly, Hélène January 2025: if you like the Maja cardigan, you may enjoy as well Maja Light , the top down DK version (instructions are both for a pullover and cardigan). Warmly, Hélène We are happy to be able to share our patterns with you for free! Unfortunately, we are not able to answer DM’s here on Ravelry. However, we hope you will like the pattern and will enjoy seeing your project come to life! Inspiration and free patterns Follow Järbo on Instagram Reseller map jarbo.se - Brand website, in Swedish Find a reseller - Nordic region, in Swedish Our official online stores eddna.se , eddna.no , eddna.de , eddna.at , eddna.nl , eddna.be Järbo is a Swedish brand established in 1896. We offer nordic design, selected yarns and accessories in stores and online.
